jobDescription: Skills and Qualifications:  Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms,  Experience with common data science toolkits, such as R, Weka, NumPy, MatLab, etc.  Great communication, written and oral, skills  Experience with data visualization tools, such as D3.js, GGplot, etc.  Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig, SparQL  Experience with NoSQL databases, such as MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase  Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc.  Good scripting and programming skills; Python, Javascript, JAVA  Data-oriented personality  Experience with Spark, Hadoop  CS degree in related domain
